overview:
Lilian Caldeira develops and oversees the methodologies and teams that deliver successful customer-centric services at eCert.

Prior to eCert, Caldeira served as a Senior Vice President at VCommerce where she oversaw consulting and client support organizations. She was the driving force behind VCommerce’s new focus as a customer-centric organization, which was achieved through her unique ability to develop and deploy methodologies and operational systems to efficiently ensure customer satisfaction.

Previously, Caldeira served as Director of Consulting Practice at Fry Inc. where she was instrumental in defining and delivering software solutions. She established the business practices for design, development and delivery of the Order Management solution within the Fry product suite. Her deep expertise assured the successful utility and quality of systems delivered to major retailers. Caldeira has worked in various sectors of the eCommerce industry and progressed through management positions at such companies as Escalate Retail, Yantra and Peregrine Systems. In these roles, Caldeira managed the successful delivery of technology solutions to major retail clients.
